1235320.name: Reach Demo
1235320.description:
There is no more day and night for you; time has stopped for you. You didn't come into this world by accident... Here you will have to see all your fears and experiences without the help of parents or friends. You are alone and your goal is to reach the light that will release you from the "world of shadows" or doom you! You are being hunted and all this thanks to one person.

You live in two worlds and if you die in this world, don't expect mercy in the real world. Remember that they are waiting for you and want to see you alive. But who?!
